metadata.description:
Collect and trade OG weapons to compliment your true 3D, metaverse ready avatar. This collection will play a special role in future project activations.


In 3000 AD, the Mechas were destroyed during the Great Purge. But now you have the opportunity to bring them back and explore a dystopian Tokyo as we realize the full potential of the LAPIX-ZERO metaverse activation.


Join the journey as we build LAPIX-ZERO into a global brand.
metadata.name: Weapon #0001
